sentences.english: Hou Yiling, English literature professor at Beijing Foreign Studies University, agrees.
sentences.chinese: 北京外國語大學英語系教授侯毅凌對此表示贊同。

sentences.english: I graduated from Shanghai International Studies University, my major is English, and i passed TEM-8 with a high mark.
sentences.chinese: 英語專業八級，上海外國語大學研究生畢業。

sentences.english: I study in Luohu Foreign Language School.
sentences.chinese: 我在羅湖外國語學校上學。

sentences.english: Besides English, we have to learn a second language.
sentences.chinese: 除了英語外，我們還須學習第二門外國語。

sentences.english: Recently, it is crazily said that Yike Zeng will go to study in Beijing International Studies University.
sentences.chinese: 最近網上瘋傳曾軼可要去北京第二外國語學院讀書了。

sentences.english: I: Have you ever learned any other foreign languages other than English?
sentences.chinese: 除了英語，你還學過別的外國語嗎？

sentences.english: In addition to Korean, Mr. Ban speaks English and French.
sentences.chinese: 除韓國語外，潘基文先生還講英語和法語。

sentences.english: Wang has released 10 Mandarin and two Japanese albums.
sentences.chinese: 王力宏發行了10張國語和2張日語專輯。

sentences.english: Mandarin "is the earliest Chinese a kingdom and texts."
sentences.chinese: 國語》是中國最早的一部國野史鉅著。

sentences.english: Frank speaks both English and Mandarin.
He speaks English well enough to pass for a native speaker.
sentences.chinese: 他英語流利得使人會以爲他講本國語呢。

sentences.english: New Heart Music's 7th Mandarin Praise and Worship album.
sentences.chinese: 《新心音樂》第七張國語敬拜專輯。

sentences.english: Don't interpret it without real understanding when you study a foreign language.
sentences.chinese: 學習外國語切莫望文生義。

sentences.english: I feel very lucky that I can come to the HIU.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得我很幸運能來到黑龍江外國語學院。

sentences.english: Loanshift: a process in which the meaning is borrowed, but the form is native.
sentences.chinese: 轉移藉詞的意義是借用的，但是形式是來自本國語。

definition: Mandarin (common language)/Putonghua (common speech of the Chinese language)/ordinary speech
unable to make sense of what one is hearing
to speak/to explain/to negotiate/to emphasise/to be particular about/as far as sth is concerned/speech/lecture
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
Southern Min, a Sinitic language spoken in southern Fujian and surrounding areas
